standard.description: Tests that are *not* general standards. You are welcome to disagree with them.

test.test_name: Form pages require authentication and have access protection
test.query_clob:
with unrestricted_pg_itms as (
      select application_id, page_id, listagg(item_name,':' on overflow truncate '...') within group (order by item_name) page_item_list
            from apex_application_page_items
            where item_protection_level = 'Unrestricted'
            group by application_id, page_id
), a30 as (
      select 
      case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'No'
      then 'N'
      when aap.page_access_protection = 'Unrestricted'
      then 'N'
      else 'Y'
      end as pass_yn,
      aap.application_id,
      aap.page_id,
      aap.page_name,
      aap.page_requires_authentication, 
      aap.page_access_protection,
      aap.build_option,
      bo.build_option_status,
      pi.page_item_list,
      aap.created_by, 
      aap.created_on, 
      aap.last_updated_by, 
      aap.last_updated_on,
	    bo.status_on_export,
	    aap.workspace
      from apex_application_pages aap
      inner join v_apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
                                    and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
      inner join unrestricted_pg_itms pi on aap.application_id = pi.application_id
                                    and aap.page_id = pi.page_id
      left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
      where aap.page_id not in (9999,101)
      and aap.page_name not in ('Login Page')
      and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
	    and aap.application_id = 17000033
)
select a30.pass_yn,
       a30.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a30.page_id,
       a30.page_name,
       a30.page_requires_authentication, 
       a30.page_access_protection,
       a30.build_option,
       a30.build_option_status,
       a30.page_item_list,
       a30.created_by, 
       a30.created_on, 
       a30.last_updated_by, 
       a30.last_updated_on,
       case when a30.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^"Page requires_authentication" attribute = %0
               "Page access protection" attribute = %1
               "Build option" attribute = %2
               "Build option status" attribute = %3
                Page items  = %4
            ^',
                                    p0 => a30.page_requires_authentication, 
                                    p1 => a30.page_access_protection,
                                    p2 => a30.build_option,
                                    p3 => a30.build_option_status,
                                    p4 => a30.page_item_list
                                    )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a30.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Page %0 (app %1) should require authentication and should not have access protection set to 'Unrestricted'.^',
                                    p0 => a30.page_id, 
                                    p1 => a30.application_id
                                    )
            end as issue_title,
			 page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 a30.workspace
from a30
test.explanation: Pages should require authentication and should not have access protection set to "Unrestricted"
test.fix: Require Authentication and set access protection to something other than ‘Unrestricted’
